text: Irafise umurwi uri imbere yiwe hamwe n’uwundi uri inyuma yiwe yabamucungera kw’itegeko ry’Imana, mu vy’ukuri Imana ntihindura ibiri mu bantu kugeza aho bazohindura ibiri mumitima yabo, n’Imana mugihe ibashakiye abantu ibihano ntakintu gishobora gukingira, canke ntawufise inkinzo uwariwe wese atari Imana yonyene gusa
